text: Glad to see new @NCCN expert consensus guidelines re #COVID19 #vaccine use in ppl w/ #cancer. Encourages risk determination based on age, diagnosis/tx, etc but also social determinants of health. Incl recs for various drug classes & vaccine timing wrt cancer tx. #COVID19nCancer https://t.co/Z92D7jl7ep https://t.co/PorB2Iuakf
